channel.title: CVE Feed for Kaspersky -- TurboVNC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kaspersky -- TurboVNC

item.title: CVE-2019-15683|2024-08-05T00:56:22.465Z -- kaspersky -- turbovnc
item.description: TurboVNC server code contains stack buffer overflow vulnerability in commit prior to cea98166008301e614e0d36776bf9435a536136e. This could possibly result into remote code execution, since stack frame is not protected with stack canary. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity. To exploit this vulnerability authorization on server is required. These issues have been fixed in commit cea98166008301e614e0d36776bf9435a536136e.
